Description: A few small disc beads of dark-green glazed composition, seven syenite discs, one cornelian barrel and seven short truncated convex bicones, and one cornelian leg-with-foot amulet.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 76.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (362)
